llemma_7b.name: EleutherAI: Llemma 7b
llemma_7b.author: eleutherai
llemma_7b.description: Llemma 7B is a language model for mathematics. It was initialized with Code Llama 7B weights, and trained on the Proof-Pile-2 for 200B tokens. Llemma models are particularly strong at chain-of-thought mathematical reasoning and using computational tools for mathematics, such as Python and formal theorem provers.
